seller_description: Millions of Americans suffer from dry eyes. Dry eyes commonly result from not enough tears being produced or tears that dry up too quickly, resulting in dryness and irritation. Luckily, Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops are at the ready with fast-acting relief to soothe dry eye symptoms. Designed to act like your own tears, these artificial tears instantly lubricate and moisturize to temporarily relieve mild and occasional dry, burning, irritated, and uncomfortable eyes. This original-strength formula is safe to use as often as needed and features a gentle preservative, Purite, that breaks down into natural tear components—like oxygen, water and sodium and chloride ions— when applied to the eye. To use Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops: 1. Tilt your head back and look up. 2. Pull your lower eyelid down away from your eyeball to create a “pocket” for the drops. 3. Hold the bottle upside down with the tip just above the pocket. 4. Gently squeeze the bottle and let the eye drop fall into the pocket. Refresh Tears is FSA and HSA eligible. Depending on your plan, you may be able to use your pre-tax dollars to cover this product as an out-of-pocket expense. Trust your dry eyes to Refresh—the #1 doctor-recommended brand with more than 35 years of experience. (Data on file, Abbvie, Inc. REF113774).
review: The bottle comes in a good size and it fits in my pocket easily. For its price, I think it’s a good value. It moisturizes my eyes and it feels refreshed and comfortable again. It works well. It’s not meant to make your eyes white, but that’s OK.
Expected_output: The seller describes the Refresh Tears Lubricant Eye Drops as a solution to alleviate dry eye symptoms, offering immediate moisturizing relief. It highlights the product's effectiveness in mimicking natural tears with gentle preservatives and suitability for frequent use. The description aligns with the seller-provided images, which portray the product's packaging, size, and marketing features like its portability and moisturizing effect. The buyer's images confirm the consistency of the product's appearance, demonstrating the same compact bottle size and branding as depicted in the seller’s visuals. Additionally, the buyer review reflects satisfaction with the product's performance, noting its ability to moisturize and refresh the eyes effectively while being conveniently pocket-sized and affordable. The review acknowledges that the product does not promise to whiten eyes, which is consistent with the seller's claims. No discrepancies were identified between the seller's promises and the buyer's experience. The buyer expresses satisfaction, appreciating the product's quality, value, and functionality. In conclusion, both parties align positively, and no fault lies with the seller or buyer, as the product meets its advertised claims and satisfies the customer's expectations.
label: 1:Here buyer satisfied with seller
